snippet.title: Dark and Darker Mobile Trailer
snippet.description:
In the abyss, even victory tastes like ash. Is there no end to the darkness?

Dark and Darker Mobile is a mobile fantasy extraction RPG game developed by KRAFTON’s Bluehole Studio. Players will go on a journey into a PvPvE experience where they will dispatch cunning adventurers and monsters while exploring dungeons consumed by darkness. As players delve deeper, treasures hidden within the shadows will promise unparalleled wealth and power, waiting for the bravest souls to claim their riches.

Stay tuned for the release of Dark and Darker Mobile on both iOS and Android platforms in 2024.

#DarkandDarkerMobile #DarkandDarker
